blood.description:
> blood?: String
Adjective to prefix "Blood" in the in-game item name.
> `${.blood || .name} Blood`
If <.blood> is omitted, <.name> will be used instead.

base.description:
> base?: String
The vanilla MC mob that this monster is based off of.
If <.base> is omitted, the item will not be dropped by a custom mob, & must be acquired with commands.

abilities.description:
> abilities?: String[]
The abilities that are granted to the player.
If <.abilities> is omitted, the item's abilities will not be displayed in-game.

desc.description:
> desc?: String[]
In-game description. Each item is a separate line.
If <.desc> is omitted, the item simply will not have an in-game description

effects.description:
> effects?: [String, Integer][]
Potion Effects IDs + Level
If <.effects> is omitted, the item will not grant potion effects to the player.
